content.intro: CRITICAL SECURITY INFORMATION: uChat is designed for casual messaging only. Please read this section carefully before using the platform.
paragraphs: HTTPS encryption protects data during transmission between your device and our servers.
Passwords are securely hashed and salted. We cannot see or recover your password.
However, messages and user data are stored as PLAIN TEXT in our database and are NOT encrypted at rest.
Server administrators can technically access message content for system maintenance, moderation, and technical purposes.
Messages are transmitted and stored without end-to-end encryption.

DO NOT use uChat to share: passwords, credit card information, banking details, social security numbers, private documents, confidential business communications, medical information, or any other sensitive data.
Use uChat ONLY for casual conversations that you are comfortable being stored as plain text.
By using uChat, you explicitly acknowledge these security limitations and accept all associated risks.

list.title: Security Measures We Implement:
items: HTTPS encryption for data in transit
Secure password hashing and salting
User authentication and session management
Basic protection against common attacks
Regular security updates to the platform

content.warning: WARNING: No system is 100% secure. In the event of a security breach, data compromise, or unauthorized access, we will notify affected users as soon as reasonably possible.

content.intro: In the event of a security breach or unauthorized access to user data, UFOnic will take the following actions:
paragraphs: We will investigate the breach and assess the scope of compromised data as quickly as possible.
Affected users will be notified via email within 72 hours of discovering the breach, where feasible.
We will provide information about what data was compromised and what steps users should take.
We will take reasonable measures to secure the platform and prevent future breaches.
We may be required to report certain breaches to regulatory authorities depending on applicable laws.
